attributes.name: model-value
attributes.desc: binding value

attributes.name: v-model
attributes.desc: binding value

attributes.name: min
attributes.desc: the minimum allowed value

attributes.name: max
attributes.desc: the maximum allowed value

attributes.name: step
attributes.desc: incremental step

attributes.name: step-strictly
attributes.desc: whether input value can only be multiple of step

attributes.name: precision
attributes.desc: precision of input value

attributes.name: size
attributes.desc: size of the component

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.desc: same as readonly in native input(2.2.16)

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.desc: whether the component is disabled

attributes.name: controls
attributes.desc: whether to enable the control buttons

attributes.name: controls-position
attributes.desc: position of the control buttons

attributes.name: name
attributes.desc: same as name in native input

attributes.name: aria-label
attributes.desc: same as aria-label in native input(a11y) (2.7.2)

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.desc: same as placeholder in native input

attributes.name: id
attributes.desc: same as id in native input

attributes.name: value-on-clear
attributes.desc: value should be set when input box is cleared(2.2.0)

attributes.name: validate-event
attributes.desc: whether to trigger form validation

attributes.name: label
attributes.desc: same as aria-label in native input(a11y) (deprecated)

attributes.name: inputmode
attributes.desc: same as inputmode in native input(2.10.3)

attributes.name: align
attributes.desc: alignment for the inner input text(2.10.5)

attributes.name: disabled-scientific
attributes.desc: disables input of scientific notation (e.g. 'e')(2.10.5)

slots.name: decrease-icon ^(2.6.3)
slots.desc: custom input box button decrease icon

slots.name: increase-icon ^(2.6.3)
slots.desc: custom input box button increase icon

events.name: @change
events.param: Function(currentValue: number | undefined, oldValue: number | undefined) => void
